title: NightmareCity: Urban Whispers
script: Between {mundane_object} and {mundane_object}, {horror_element} waits. {threat}. Skyscrapers cast shadows that move when no one is watching. The city never sleeps, but its dreams are becoming real. now you understand why people disappear. The city breathes at night. Its breath smells of decay and forgotten dreams. Neon signs flicker in patterns that spell warnings only your subconscious can read.
